mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_CONTRACT_MAIN (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
contract_id ,
contract_no ,
contract_type ,
contract_ori_no ,
contract_name ,
ass_year ,
ass_month ,
ven_id ,
ven_no ,
sign_date ,
buy_type ,
start_date ,
end_date ,
contract_detail ,
service_detail ,
emp_main ,
provider ,
is_bid ,
contract_money ,
create_emp ,
create_date ,
check_emp ,
check_date ,
state ,
is_group ,
cur_code ,
is_init ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
ASS_CONTRACT_MAIN_SEQ.nextval ,
#{contract_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{contract_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{contract_ori_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{contract_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ass_month,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{ven_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{ven_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{sign_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{buy_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{start_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{end_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{contract_detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{service_detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{emp_main,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{is_bid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{contract_money,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{create_emp,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{create_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{check_emp,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{check_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{is_group,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{cur_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{is_init,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
)

INSERT INTO ASS_CONTRACT_MAIN (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
contract_id ,
contract_no ,
contract_type ,
contract_ori_no ,
contract_name ,
ass_year ,
ass_month ,
ven_id ,
ven_no ,
sign_date ,
buy_type ,
start_date ,
end_date ,
contract_detail ,
service_detail ,
emp_main ,
provider ,
is_bid ,
contract_money ,
create_emp ,
create_date ,
check_emp ,
check_date ,
state ,
is_group ,
cur_code ,
is_init ,
) select ASS_CONTRACT_MAIN_SEQ.nextval , t.* from(
select
#{item.group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.contract_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.contract_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.contract_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.contract_ori_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.contract_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.ass_year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.ass_month,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.ven_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.ven_no,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.sign_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{item.buy_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.start_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{item.end_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{item.contract_detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.service_detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.emp_main,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.is_bid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.contract_money,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.create_emp,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.create_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{item.check_emp,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.check_date,jdbcType=DATE} ,
#{item.state,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.is_group,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
#{item.cur_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
#{item.is_init,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
from dual
mapper.select: SELECT acm.group_id, acm.hos_id, acm.copy_code, acm.contract_id, acm.contract_no, acm.contract_type, acm.contract_ori_no, acm.contract_name, acm.ass_year, acm.ass_month, acm.ven_id, acm.ven_no, acm.sign_date, acm.buy_type, acm.start_date, acm.end_date, acm.contract_detail, acm.service_detail, acm.emp_main, acm.provider, acm.is_bid, acm.contract_money, acm.create_emp, acm.create_date, acm.check_emp, acm.check_date, acm.state, acm.is_group, acm.cur_code, hsd.sup_code ven_code, hsd.sup_name ven_name, su.user_name emp_main_name, su1.user_name create_emp_name, su2.user_name check_emp_name FROM ASS_CONTRACT_MAIN acm left join HOS_SUP_DICT hsd on acm.group_id=hsd.group_id and acm.hos_id=hsd.hos_id and acm.ven_id=hsd.sup_id and acm.ven_no=hsd.sup_no left join SYS_USER su on acm.group_id=su.group_id and acm.hos_id=su.hos_id and acm.emp_main=su.user_id left join Sys_User su1 on acm.group_id=su1.group_id and acm.hos_id=su1.hos_id and acm.create_emp=su1.user_id left join Sys_User su2 on acm.group_id=su2.group_id and acm.hos_id=su2.hos_id and acm.check_emp=su2.user_id WHERE acm.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and acm.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and acm.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and acm.contract_id = #{contract_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
